review: This little streamer arguably offers the best performance of current streamers. It has the specs for the title but optimization falls short here and there. This is apparent when pressed with rapid menu navigation, mostly within certain apps.Speaking of apps, the Amazon TV leaves a little to be desired. Many of the main boxes are checked but some apps available on other brands, and even on other Amazon devices are absent.But when it comes to pure media streaming the Amazon TV is excellent. 1080p video is streamed effortlessly (with well optimized apps) thanks to the dual band wifi and powerful processor. Dolby digital+ delivers very good audio quality across multiple channels alongside the crisp video.Those of us who aren't subscribed to Amazon prime are inconvenienced with a main menu heavily structured for prime services. It's also worth noting the voice search/command feature works surprisingly well.TL;DRIt's powerful, App support is just ok, menu is prime centric, good remote & voice function.
author: Jables
